com.github.mdsimmo.bomberman.arenas

Interface Arena

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoxArena

    public interface Arena
extends org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable
    An arena defines the block layout of a game. An arena also defines where spawn points are and what blocks are destructible.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Arena.Callback
      A generic arena call back interface for use when a long running task return an arena

        serialize

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        Gets the name of this arena.
        Returns:
        the arena's name

      • contains

        boolean contains(int x,
                 int y,
                 int z)
        Tests if the arena contains a point. The point is relative to the arena's origin.
        Parameters:
        x - arena's x origin
        y - arena's y origin
        z - arena's z origin
        Returns:
        true if the arena contains the point

      • contains

        boolean contains(Point3D p)
        Tests if the arena contains the point. The point is relative to the arena's origin.
        Parameters:
        p - where to build the arena
        Returns:
        true if the arena contains the point

      • getSpawnPoints

        List<Point3D> getSpawnPoints()
        Gets a list of the spawn points. The spawn points are relative to the arena's origin.
        Returns:
        the arena's origin

      • build

        void build(Place origin,
           Arena.Callback callback)
        Builds the arena at the specified origin. This task will be done over several server ticks. When construction work has finished, the callback method will be informed.
        Parameters:
        origin - the place to build the arena at
        callback - what to inform when the arena has finished being built. May be null to have no callback.
